player.name: Magic Johnson
player.physicalDescription: tall 6'9" point guard build, radiant megawatt smile, high-top fade haircut, expressive animated face, dark skin
player.archetype: The Showman, made everyone around him better, pure joy on the court

figure.name: Joseph
figure.attributeDescription: magnificent multi-colored robe with vibrant stripes of red, blue, gold, purple, and green - the famous coat given by his father
figure.visualStyle: young Hebrew vizier of Egypt, dreamer and interpreter
figure.clothing: the legendary coat of many colors over a fine linen Egyptian-style tunic, golden collar of Egyptian nobility
figure.physicalDescription: young handsome Hebrew man, clean-shaven in Egyptian style, dignified bearing, wise knowing eyes that see beyond the present, olive skin
figure.archetype: The Dreamer, rose from slavery to save nations, saw what others couldn't

connection.thematic: Both were visionaries who elevated everyone around them and saw possibilities others missed
connection.narrative: Joseph saw the future in dreams. Magic saw the future in fast breaks. Both made believers out of doubters.
connection.relationship: Visionaries whose gift was seeing what others couldn't

interactions.description: Standing together as visionaries, radiating confidence and joy
Celebratory connection between two who elevated their teams
